title: Library Management System
discription: The Library Management System is a software application designed to manage and automate various operations of a library

title: Car Rent Website
discription: This repository contains the codebase for a dynamic car rental website that allows users to browse and rent cars based on availability and dates.

title: Movie Downloader
discription: this project help you to download movies. web scaping technology is used in this project.

title: Stock Prediction Model
discription: In this project, we use historical stock price data to predict future stock prices. The model is built using Python and utilizes TensorFlow/Keras for the deep learning framework.

title: Weather forecast
discription: this project help you to get information about weather or get weather information using api.

title: Website Builder - No Code GUI Platform
discription: Welcome to Website Builder, a user-friendly platform designed to help you create stunning websites without writing a single line of code.
